entry.title: Aave Ends Rewards In Latest Blow To Yield Farmers
entry.summary: Aave has stopped offering incentives to Ethereum v2 users in its native token, AAVE. At a total value-locked (TVL) of $8.57B, Aave is the third-largest DeFi protocol and the largest decentralized money market. entry.title: Mirror Taps Optimism for New Writing NFTs
entry.summary: Web3 blog platform Mirror now lets writers sell their essays as NFTs. Mirror, a kind of Medium meets Web3, lets bloggers publish essays on the Ethereum blockchain, then vote on the best ones with the platform’s governance token. entry.title: Outdated Node Clients Cause Blockchain Reorg on Eth2 Beacon Chain￼
entry.summary: The Eth2 Beacon Chain’s validators fell out of step on May 25 after a client update boosted some clients but caused confusion among validators who hadn’t bothered to upgrade.
